page.title: 15INGRAM SHOW
page.content: An annual event which takes place further down the valley in Ingram is the local show. A major feature of this show is a fell-race which begins on the west side of Brough law near Peggy Bell's Bridge. The course takes the runners up the steepest part of Brough law which is mostly bare scree to begin with (known locally as the glitters), up to the campsite on the top of the hill, to the south side of the campsite and then on down to the second set of toilets near Bulbies Wood. There is a prize for the first person finished and also a cup for the first person in the parish to finish.
